https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sIE5BafMU0gPYOqBSiYzTxmHqGM.jpg ALL SAINTS is based on the inspiring true story of salesman-turned-pastor Michael Spurlock, the tiny church he was ordered to shut down, and a group of refugees from Southeast Asia. Together, they risked everything to plant seeds for a future that might just save them all. All Saints
